name: Rotating Witch
description:
Brief Play as a little witch, and use the rotating teacups to fetch the ingredients and make delicious food!

 

Operation Left Mouse - Interact (Grab and Submit Ingredients, Change Cup) A / D - Switch Direction Cloud UI - Suggestion (Name of objects can interact) Arrow - Indicator (Direction of objects can interact) ESC / DELETE - Main Menu / Pause

 

Credit Game Design / Level Design - Vivian Chen  Game Design / Programming - Nickel Wu Music - Bethany  熊熊子 · Rotating Witch   Reference Assets - Kenney Sound Effect - opengameart, aigei
